thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 20 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Medizone Announces Commencement Of Involuntary Bankruptcy Proceedings

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Medizone Announces Commencement Of Involuntary Bankruptcy Proceedings
text:
April 20 (Reuters) - Medizone International Inc:
* MEDIZONE INTERNATIONAL ANNOUNCES COMMENCEMENT OF INVOLUNTARY BANKRUPTCY PROCEEDINGS AGAINST THE COMPANY
* MEDIZONE INTERNATIONAL INC - COMPANY IS EVALUATING ITS OPTIONS IN LIGHT OF INVOLUNTARY BANKRUPTCY PROCEEDING
* MEDIZONE INTERNATIONAL - CERTAIN CREDITORS COMMENCED INVOLUNTARY BANKRUPTCY PROCEEDING UNDER CHAPTER 11 OF UNITED STATES BANKRUPTCY CODE AGAINST CO
* MEDIZONE INTERNATIONAL INC - CREDITORS INCLUDE FORMER CEO EDWIN MARSHALL & JILL MARSHALL, FORMER DIRECTOR OF OPERATIONS OF CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
